form.official-title: To amend title 49, United States Code, to clarify the use of a towaway trailer transportation combination, and for other purposes.

section.header: Commercial delivery of light- and medium-duty trailers

subsection.text: Section 31111(a) of title 49, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: by redesignating paragraph (4) as paragraph (2); and
by inserting after paragraph (3) the following:
The term towaway trailer transporter combination means a combination of vehicles consisting of a trailer transporter towing unit and 2 trailers or semitrailers—

subparagraph.text: with a total combined weight that does not exceed 26,000 pounds; and
in which the trailers or semitrailers carry no property and constitute inventory property of a manufacturer, distributor, or dealer of such trailers or semitrailers.

paragraph.text: The term trailer transporter towing unit means a power unit that is not used to carry property while operating in a towaway trailer transporter combination.

subsection.text: Section 31111(b)(1) of such title is amended—

paragraph.text: in subparagraph (E), by striking or at the end;
in subparagraph (F), by striking the period at the end and inserting ; or; and
by adding at the end the following:

subparagraph.text: has the effect of imposing an overall length limitation of less than 82 feet on a towaway trailer transporter combination.

paragraph.text: Section 31112(a)(1) of such title is amended by inserting or trailers or semitrailers transported as part of a towaway trailer transporter combination (as defined in section 31111(a) after truck tractor.
Section 31114(a)(2) of such title is amended—

subparagraph.text: by inserting , or any towaway trailer transporter combination (as defined in section 31111(a)) that is not longer than 82 feet before the period at the end.
